title: This is Lloyd's
creator_credit: Eric Fullilove, Terry Ashwood and Associated British-Pathe
brief_description: Covers the history of Lloyd’s and shows how the market works, and how insurance business is placed. The diversity of risks accepted by Lloyd’s is indicated, from livestock and prize-fights to aviation and motor insurance. The film shows the committee room during the ballot for election of candidates for the committee in session and the work of its staff behind the scenes, and visits a Lloyd’s agency.
